page.title: 09Science and Technology
page.content: We have several working factories.We have a fur factory,food factory,sweet factory and carpet{factory.}We have a large river nearby.It is called the river Don.Nearby there is also a man made canal.This was used a lot more about one hundred years ago when it was used for transporting industrial {goods.}Conisbrough has a population of about thirty thousand people.All the schools have at least one computer.Our school has two B.B.C{ micro } computers.One is a disc drive computer and one is a tape drive computer.None of our local shops have computers except for the banks and building societies.We have a telephone exchange,which is situated of Old Road on the edge of the Miners Welfare playing fields.In Donna Maries shops there are some computer games.Poeple put money in to play them.
